title: GET_PED_TEXTURE_VARIATION
content:
0x04A355E041E004E60xC0A8590A// GetPedTextureVariation
int GET_PED_TEXTURE_VARIATION(Ped ped, int componentId);Parameters:ped: The ped handle.componentId: The component id to get the texture variation from. Refer to SET_PED_COMPONENT_VARIATION.
codeBlocks:
// GetPedTextureVariation
int GET_PED_TEXTURE_VARIATION(Ped ped, int componentId);

local ped = PlayerPedId()
-- Example usage for GET_PED_TEXTURE_VARIATION
GetPedTextureVariation(ped, 0)
